__prompts__.project_name: The name of the project (it will only be used to set the admin site title)
__prompts__.project_slug: Do you want to rename the folder containing the project?
__prompts__.django_app_name: Set the name of the default Django app
__prompts__.configure_celery: Will you use Celery on this project?
__prompts__.mq_user: Enter the RabbitMQ user (only needed if you are using Celery)
__prompts__.mq_password: Enter the RabbitMQ password (only needed if you are using Celery)
__prompts__.initialize_git_repo: Would you like to initialize a Git repository?
__prompts__.configure_angular_project: Would you like to configure an Angular project?
